SEARCH
程序包 Controller

类 HoroscopeController

java.lang.Object
Controller.HoroscopeController
public class HoroscopeController extends Object
Manages interactions between the horoscope panel and the horoscope service in the finance management system. Handles loading welcome images, generating weekly horoscope reports, and navigating between welcome and report views.
版本:
1.0
作者:
Group 19

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型

    Service for generating horoscope reports.
    private static final int
    IMAGE_TARGET_HEIGHT
    Target height for loaded images.
    private static final int
    IMAGE_TARGET_WIDTH
    Target width for loaded images.
    private final ImageLoader
    imageLoader
    Utility for loading images.
    private final String
    username
    Username of the current user.
    private final HoroscopePanel
    view
    Horoscope panel for displaying UI components.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    private void
    loadReport()
    Loads a weekly horoscope report asynchronously, including its image, and updates the view.
    void
    loadWelcomeImage()
    Loads the welcome image asynchronously and updates the view.
    void
    onBackClicked()
    Navigates back to the welcome card and reloads the welcome image.
    void
    onRefreshClicked()
    Refreshes the weekly horoscope report when the refresh button is clicked.
    void
    onRevealClicked()
    Initiates the loading of a weekly horoscope report when the reveal button is clicked.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • HoroscopeController

      public HoroscopeController(String username, HoroscopePanel view)
      Constructs a HoroscopeController with the specified username and view. Initializes the horoscope service and image loader, and validates the username.
      参数:
      username - the username of the current user
      view - the horoscope panel for UI interaction
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the username is null or empty

  • 方法详细资料

    • loadWelcomeImage

      public void loadWelcomeImage()
      Loads the welcome image asynchronously and updates the view. Displays a loading state during image retrieval and handles errors if loading fails.

    • onRevealClicked

      public void onRevealClicked()
      Initiates the loading of a weekly horoscope report when the reveal button is clicked.

    • onRefreshClicked

      public void onRefreshClicked()
      Refreshes the weekly horoscope report when the refresh button is clicked.

    • onBackClicked

      public void onBackClicked()
      Navigates back to the welcome card and reloads the welcome image.

    • loadReport

      private void loadReport()
      Loads a weekly horoscope report asynchronously, including its image, and updates the view. Displays a loading state during data retrieval and handles errors by showing a default error report.
